sentences.en: But we have the same problem in UK.
sentences.cn: 而在我们英国，也有同样的问题。

sentences.en: It is not known if they will return to the UK for the birth.
sentences.cn: 现在还不知道他们是否会为了孩子的出生而回到英国。

sentences.en: She was domiciliated in Canada.
Canada produces wheat and furs.
sentences.cn: 加拿大出产小麦和毛皮。

sentences.en: He has lived in Canada for more than twenty years and is completely Canadianized now.
sentences.cn: 他在加拿大已经住了二十多年了，现在完全加拿大化了。

sentences.en: For example, think about the differences we observe with people from different parts of the USA.
sentences.cn: 例如，想一想那些来自美国各地的人们，我们可以观察到他们之间的差异。

sentences.en: "You must see the handcuffs, made in USA!" he said repeatedly.
sentences.cn: 他反复地说“你一定得看看那些手铐，美国造的！”

sentences.en: What can Algeria hope for from their next two games against England and USA? Can Ghana be the surprise team of the group phase?
sentences.cn: 在接下来两场面对英格兰和美国的比赛中阿尔及利亚能期待些什么呢》加纳能成为小组出线黑马吗？

sentences.en: You could always ask Beth – she’s got plenty of money.
sentences.cn: 你总是可以去问贝丝——她有很多钱。

sentences.en: I saw you talking to that girl. Who is she?
sentences.cn: 我看见你和那个女孩子说话。 她是谁？

sentences.en: What did she say when you told her?

sentences.cn: 这个学生炫耀他的知识。

sentences.en: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.cn: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.en: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.cn: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

sentences.en: About 20 pupils study music here.
sentences.cn: 大约20名小学生在这里学习音乐。
